snippet.title: Isle of the Dead 1993 - PC - Gameplay
snippet.description:
More like 'Isle of the wut jus hapen?'. :\

So I'm fighting off hordes of zombies with my magical trusty double barrel that doesn't need to be reloaded, and suddenly I'm going to be eaten by dogs. An army of the undead around me, and I get eaten... BY DOGS.

I'm sorry, but this game stinks worse than manure.


...Okay, so maybe I'm being a little harsh, but man, I really liked the idea of an adventure game mixed with a first person shooter, with zombies to boot!

Too bad aiming is a pain in the rear, and the jungles, and caverns ARE IMPOSSIBLE TO NAVIGATE!

Oh, also, somewhat awkward key settings, even for an older game.

Unfortunately, I couldn't get the sound effects to work. I also blame that on you, 'Isle of the Dead'!
